summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented: the success state shows the exact requested primary message on Yes-click, and a dense, non-interactive kiss-shower animation (40 ðŸ’‹ particles) is displayed via a fixed, overflow-hidden overlay with a custom fall animation.

hallucinated_features.description: Global Valentine's Day theme/style overhaul (OKLCH color variables) and addition of Google Fonts imports (Playfair Display, Poppins).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1/REQ-2; requirements only mention success text update and kiss animation.

hallucinated_features.description: Additional success-state copy beyond the required primary message (e.g., "I knew you'd say yes! ðŸ’•" and further paragraph text).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1 only requests the exact primary success message; extra messaging was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Page scroll/overflow manipulation tied to the moving No button (sets document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden' when positioned).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; also risks changing the existing "No" evasive behavior, which is explicitly a non-goal to change.
